data1.Desc: Multiple errors in log files after the Odoo CE package installation from the platform Marketplace
An error occurs after redeploying the compute node of the DjangoCMS package installed from the platform Marketplace
An error occurs when removing a deployed application from the WildFly node after removing public IP

data2.Desc: Incorrect error handling for issues with the 'jem docker getenv' and 'jem docker getruncmd' commands
Incorrect firewall rules handling on the Memcached node when scaling compute nodes
An environment domain cannot temporarily be resolved after attaching an external IPv6 address
An error occurs when retrieving an environment variable with value in the JSON format
An error occurs when deploying an application if the archive contains the '/' absolute path
JPS installations with the addNodes action are visually stuck in the dashboard despite being completed successfully
Unnecessary systemd units in the Ubuntu VPS
A custom 'Sequential deployment with delay' value is reset to default for the subsequent deployments
Incorrect localization in some emails when installing complex packages with multiple email notifications
Network routes are missing after redeploying containers with multiple public IP addresses
The environment delete action is stuck if any previous action is not finished yet
Incorrect public IP count validation when adding new IP addresses
The strict-transport-security header should be removed from the 50x error pages
An error occurs when sending a GET request with the 'Content-Type=application/json' header and API access token
The OSTEMPLATE variable should be updated if the base OS was changed during the container redeploy
An error occurs when redeploying a Debian 11 node that operates as an NFS server (exports data)
An error occurs when refilling the account balance if the sum is too big
